title: Audubon Creek
posting_body: 📌🛑🛑Our prices are so low it's scary!
Don't be tricked this season into high apartment prices when you can be treated like you should!
Ghost those boring amenities and get caught in a web of spooktacular amenities such as our Playground , Fitness Center, & 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance!
Audubon Creek is a community located in Norcross and is bound to offer you great location minutes away from Grocery stores, 85 Highway, dining, shopping, and entertainment venues.
We have spacious One, Two, and Tree Bedrooms units.
Our units have cherry cabinetry, vinyl, and dark appliances.
If you are interested in making this beautiful community your home, contact us today to schedule a tour!
🚨📍🚨 🚨📍🚨Solo esta semana applica con solo $65 por persona.
AUDUBON CREEK Apartments ofrece apartamentos de una y dos habitaciones en alquiler en Norcross, Georgia.
Estamos cerca de la I-85North por la Beaver
Ruin y la Indian Trail, alado del Departamento de servicios para GA de Licencias,Nuestros apartamentos de dos habitaciones tienen conexiones para lavadoras y secadoras,( solo los de 2 y 3 recamaras)
electrodomésticos contemporáneos, pisos de vinyl, cable / wifi listos, y patios.
agua basura y alcantarillado es un bill fijo, que NO cambia cada mes.
Disfrute de los pocos espacios disponibles!!
